nodes.text: The Opposition on Pijal led a non-violent campaign led by Halin Azucca to protest the link between the Pijali monarchy and Czerka Corp in 40 BBY.

Princess Fanry formed the Blackguard in secret and staged violent attacks and framed the Opposition for it, in order to seize full power in the monarchy. The Jedi Order sent Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi to monitor the forth-coming treaty between the monarchy and Czerka, and investigated the Opposition during their mission.
The campaign appears in the 2019 novel Master & Apprentice, written by Claudia Gray.
